item.title: About
item.description: Hello, My name is Chung. I am a developer based in Tokyo, Japan. I do Web and iOS development sometimes. I love learning new technologies and meet new people. In this blog, I want to share my knowledge of programming as well as the experiences while living in Japan. The content is mainly in Japanese because I am learning Japanese, too. I think it is an excellent opportunity to output

item.title: 開発マシンのTips
item.description: よく使われるコマンドをAliasに ~/.zshrc or ~/.bash_profile or whatever you use # append this line to the bottom source ~/.aliases ~/.aliases alias gs="git status" alias gl="git log" alias gaa="git add ." alias gc="git commit -m " alias gclean="git reset --hard && clean -df" alias projects="cd /Volumes/Data/projects " alias p="phpunit " alias pf="phpunit --filter " source ~/.aliases こ

item.title: [Docker]メモ
item.description: Docker上開発環境を構築してみた Stack: php, Laravel, nginx, postgres 各環境ファイル作成 docker-compose.yml version: '3' services: nginx: build: ./nginx ports: - 8080:80 volumes: - ./nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf - ./src:/var/www/app depends_on: - web web: build: ./src volumes: - ./src:/var/www/app depends_on: - db db: image: 'postgres:9.3' ports: - "5432:5432" env_file: - ./data/env_file volumes: #
